data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio de Mazatlan.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 2, Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mazatlan's half?
Alejandro Funk Villafane awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Pumas UNAM in Mazatlan.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Efrain Velarde (Mazatlan) gets a yellow card.
Mazatlan's Luis Mendoza has run offside.
In the minute 11, Alejandro Funk Villafane blows against Mazatlan's Cesar Huerta for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
Throw-in for Mazatlan close to the penalty box.
In the minute 15, Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 16, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Pumas UNAM.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 20, Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Fernando Aristeguieta for Mazatlan who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio de Mazatlan.
In the minute 24, Mazatlan's Fernando Aristeguieta is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick Mazatlan.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
In the minute 29, Mazatlan have a dangerous throw-in.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
In the minute 35, Cesar Huerta of Mazatlan is pulled up for offside.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Mazatlan.
Pumas UNAM needs to be cautious. Mazatlan have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
In Mazatlan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 43, Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mazatlan's half?
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Mazatlan.
Pumas UNAM drive upfield and Nicolas Freire gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Mazatlan defender.
In the minute 44, Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Funk Villafane.
Luis Quintana of Pumas UNAM gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mazatlan.
In the minute 45, 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
In the minute 45, Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio de Mazatlan.
In the minute 46, Alejandro Funk Villafane has blown to start the second-half.
In Mazatlan Pumas UNAM attack through Sebastian Saucedo. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 46, Alejandro Funk Villafane awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
Andres Lillini is making the team's first substitution at Estadio de Mazatlan with Jero Rodriguez replacing Luis Quintana.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a throw-in for Pumas UNAM, close to Mazatlan's area.
In the minute 48, Pumas UNAM are in shooting range from this free kick.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Funk Villafane.
Johan Vasquez (Pumas UNAM) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 51, Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Mazatlan in the half of Pumas UNAM.
At Estadio de Mazatlan, Leonel Lopez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 53, Mario Osuna for Mazatlan is whistled offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Can Pumas UNAM capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mazatlan's half?
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 58, In Mazatlan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mazatlan's half?
The home team have replaced Fernando Aristeguieta with Miguel Sansores. This is the first substitution made today by Francisco Palencia.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 60, Juan Iturbe (Pumas UNAM) has received a yellow card from Alejandro Funk Villafane.
Carlos Gutierrez is replacing Sebastian Saucedo for the away team.
In the minute 62, Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM's Carlos Gutierrez misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Mazatlan's half.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 68, Miguel Sansores for Mazatlan drives towards goal at Estadio de Mazatlan. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Francisco Palencia (Mazatlan) is making a second substitution, with Camilo Sanvezzo replacing Mario Osuna.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Mazatlan's Nicolas Diaz gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de Mazatlan. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 70, Mazatlan have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Funk Villafane.
Mazatlan's Miguel Sansores gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio de Mazatlan.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Pumas UNAM are coming forward and Carlos Gutierrez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 73, Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Camilo Sanvezzo for Mazatlan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mazatlan.
In the minute 75, Favio Alvarez is on a sub for Leonel Lopez for Pumas UNAM.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Favio Alvarez (Pumas UNAM) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 77, Alejandro Funk Villafane awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Mazatlan.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 80, Alejandro Funk Villafane awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Mazatlan drive forward but Miguel Sansores is judged offside.
In the minute 84, Pumas UNAM make their fourth substitution with Erik Lira replacing Juan Iturbe.
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Candido Ramirez is replacing Martin Rodriguez for Mazatlan at Estadio de Mazatlan.
In the minute 87, Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Alejandro Funk Villafane signals a free kick to Mazatlan.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 88, Miguel Sansores is booked for the home team.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Mazatlan.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Funk Villafane.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Alejandro Funk Villafane.
In Mazatlan Pumas UNAM's Nicolas Freire is caught offside.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
Pumas UNAM's Juan Dinenno has been booked in Mazatlan.
